message.content:
To calculate Return on Assets (ROA), we use the formula:

ROA = (Net Profit) / (Average Total Assets) × 100%

Step 1: Identify Net Profit from the income statement (or cash flow)

- Net Profit = 111,731.83

Step 2: Calculate Average Total Assets

- Initial Total Assets (2023-12-31) = 16,000,000.00
- Ending Total Assets (2024-02-03) = 19,501,451.49

Average Total Assets = (16,000,000.00 + 19,501,451.49) / 2  
= 35,501,451.49 / 2  
= 17,750,725.745

Step 3: Calculate ROA

ROA = (111,731.83 / 17,750,725.745) × 100%  
≈ 0.629% (rounded to three decimal places)

```json
{"solution": {"Return on Assets (ROA)": "0.63%"}}
```
